mapper.select: SELECT rb.RECRUITMENT_ID, rb.TITLE, cs.category_sub_name, rbt.BOARD_NAME, cl.CURRENT_STD_COUNT, rb.wish_pay, u.NICKNAME FROM RECRUITMENT_BOARD rb INNER JOIN CONCERN c ON rb.RECRUITMENT_ID = c.recruitment_std_id INNER JOIN CLASS cl on rb.class_id = cl.class_id INNER JOIN CATEGORY_SUB cs on cl.category_sub_id = cs.category_sub_id INNER JOIN USERS u on rb.ID = u.ID INNER JOIN RECRUITMENT_BOARD_TYPE rbt on rb.RECRUITMENT_BOARD_ID = rbt.RECRUITMENT_BOARD_ID
select count(*) from concern where USER_ID = 6 and RECRUITMENT_STD_ID = 2
